item.description:
Yankee Homecoming celebrates Motown’s 50th with a Dance Party!!!


Come out and dance the night away to all of the old Motown sounds!



Yankee Homecoming celebrates Motown's 50th with a Dance Party!! WNBP 1450 personalities will be “spinning the tunes”! Your support of this event provides funding for the 1st Annual Yankee Homecoming Youth Community Service Awards, and the Parade. Buy your tickets at Mission Oak Grill, Newburyport or The Chamber of Commerce.

Tickets are: $10/advance; $15/door, Cash Bar. You are responsible for purchasing your own tickets either in advance or at the door.

Parking: There's plenty of on street parking spots right on Green Street, also there is 2 large parking lots close to this restaurant, one right off of Green Street, and another one at the end of Green street, between the Black Cow and The Firehouse/Not you Average Joe's.

The Mission Oak Function Room: Is located steps from Newburyport Harbor, is a grand space with cathedral ceilings, stained-glass floor-to-ceiling windows and original cathedral lanterns. Located in what was originally a Baptist Church, the entire space has been transformed into one of the most beautiful venues north of Boston and is certainly the most unique location in all of Massachusetts.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be ouside at the entrance to the restaurant.
item.name: Motown’s 50th Dance Party!!!
